casebody.data:
Saunders v. New York Cent. & H. R. R. Co. (Supreme Court, General Term, Second Department. December, 1891.) Action by Alexander Saunders against the Hew York Central & Hudson River Railroad Company.

Argued before Barnard, P. J., and Pratt, J.

Ho opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs, on opinion in Railroad Co. v. Aldridge, (Sup.) 16 N. Y. Supp. 674.
